title: Kenneth Cole Reaction Home Granite Rug at Bed Bath & Beyond
description: The Granite rug from Kenneth Cole Reaction Home has a neutral earthen tone that gathers the light. Its inspired by geological mineral layers and adds a naturally elegant finished look to any room. Thanks for watching.

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/Kenneth-Cole-Reaction-reg-Home-Granite-Rug-in-Putty/3246270? 
The Granite rug from Kenneth Cole Reaction Home has a neutral earthen tone that gathers the light. Its inspired by geological mineral layers and adds a naturally elegant finished look to any room. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts: The Granite area rug by Kenneth Cole reaction home was designed exclusively for Bed Bath and Beyond. With a neutral earth and tone that gathers light. The granite rug is inspired by geological  mineral layers and adds a finished look to any room. This rug is available in four sizes, Including accent, area and runner sizes, and is easy care polypropylene.  The Granite area rug is part of the Kenneth Cole reaction home collection. It is available exclusively online and at select Bed Bath and Beyond stores.
